page.title: 10SECONDARY SCHOOLS
page.content: RUSKINGTON has a Secondary School that has about 400 pupils .At the moment the Lincolnshire Education Authority are investigating the falling role in the local schools. There have recently been meetings in many of the schools with parents listening to the authority plus putting over their own ideas on how the education of their children should be conducted. The local people belive that one of the rural schools may have to close. THE RURAL SCHOOLS BEING :Ruskington, Billinghay,(5 miles from Ruskington)and Billingboro, (10 miles from Ruskington. {AT THE PRESENT TIME NO ONE KNOWS {WHAT THE RESULT OF THE INVESTIGATION {WILL BE. }
